name: Technobabel
description:
Click and drag tiles to perform actions!  Defeat the evil robot spider!

Overview of the Actions

  • Sword - deal damage and knockback when enemy is close
  • Gun - deal damage at any range
  • Plus - heal
  • Shield - block upcoming attack and knockback
  • Right Arrow - advance
  • Left Arrow - retreat
  • Up Arrow - increase strength of all actions

Credits

Programming, Art, Sound - WaveCollapse - itch.io

Music - NES Shooter Music (5 tracks, 3 jingles) | OpenGameArt.org
